title: Appreciate Value? You'll Get a Deal at Lincoln Terrace Apartments
posting_body: ['Lincoln Terrace Apartments', 'Visit our community today!', '25 E 5th Ave Denver, CO 80203', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', '$1061/month', 'Unit Type:', '2-BR 1-BA', 'Unit Size:', '962 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Lincoln Terrace Apartments is a cat friendly community, dogs are allowed if service animals.', 'We allow two (2) cats max per household.', '$25/pet pet rent.', '$200 pet deposit.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '❖ Affordable Housing', '❖ Community Room', '❖ Controlled Access', '❖ Online Portal', '❖ Onsite Maintenance', '❖ Onsite Management', '❖ Section 8 Vouchers Accepted', '❖ Shopping Nearby', '❖ Trash Chutes', '❖ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '❖ 24-Hour Fitness Center with Free Weights', '❖ All Paid Utilities', '❖ Contactless Online Payment', '❖ Great Location in near Downtown Denver', '❖ Laundry Facility on Each Floor', '❖ Parking Garage', '❖ Public Transportation', '❖ Recycling Available', 'Description:', 'Currently fully leased, applications accepted for future availability.', "You won't know what is possible with apartment living until you live at Lincoln Terrace.", 'This community is outfitted with you, the renter, in mind.', 'Our amenity package and location are perfectly equipped for all lifestyles.', 'In fact, our apartments are in the best location in all of Denver.', "When you're here, you'll be minutes from all the exciting aspect of downtown that you could want.", "This means you can easily attend all the sports and other events happening there, and you'll be just a short commute from all the top destinations of Denver.", 'This unit comes with:', '❖ Individual AC and Heat Control', '❖ Kitchen Appliances', '❖ Walk-In Closets', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Property Management:', 'Security Properties', 'This is an affordable community.', 'Income & student restrictions apply, please contact the leasing office for pricing, information and guidelines.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '883140D5319F448']
